about.description:
About Matbakh

Matbakh is your intelligent nutrition platform that combines personalized nutrition recommendations with seasonal variety and modern technology. Our goal is to help you find healthy and enjoyable meals—tailored to your preferences, allergies, and goals. We focus on:

Personalization: In your profile, you enter allergies, favorite and disliked foods as well as nutrition goals. Matbakh automatically filters out unsuitable options and highlights matching suggestions.

Seasonal orientation: We show you which ingredients are currently in season. This way you cook fresh, environmentally conscious, and varied meals without having to search long for suitable ingredients.

Multilingual user experience: Matbakh is available in multiple languages. All content, labels, and notifications are dynamically adapted to your language setting.

AI-powered recommendations: Behind the scenes, our agents analyze food pairings and provide inspiration on which combinations harmonize in taste or are nutritionally sensible.

Simple demo calculator: Try our calorie and macro calculator directly on the landing page—fast, anonymous, and without registration to get a feel for your needs.

Modern UI/UX: A clear, responsive design ensures that you can navigate easily on desktop and mobile. Intuitive multiselects and understandable notifications make operation simple.

Scalability & privacy: Your profile data is treated confidentially. Thanks to RLS policies in the database and secure Edge Functions, your privacy remains protected. At the same time, the architecture is flexibly expandable—from shopping lists to personalized reports.

Matbakh accompanies you from the first inspiration to the implementation in your kitchen. Whether you're just starting out or working specifically towards a nutrition goal: We provide the tools and content to make informed decisions and bring enjoyment and health into harmony. Discover Matbakh—and cook with clarity, variety, and ease!
